# Room Layout App - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Visual room layout application built with TypeScript, React, and Vite for interactive grid-based room design.

## Technology Stack
- TypeScript
- React 18
- Vite
- HTML5 Canvas for grid rendering

## Project Structure
- `/src/components` - React components (Grid, Furniture, Toolbar)
- `/src/types` - TypeScript type definitions
- `/src/utils` - Helper functions
- `/src/hooks` - Custom React hooks

## Development Guidelines
- Use functional components with hooks
- Maintain type safety with TypeScript
- Test all features before committing
- Update documentation with code changes
- Commit code, tests, and docs together

## Current Progress
- [x] Project initialized
- [ ] Core grid rendering
- [ ] Line drawing functionality
- [ ] Furniture management
- [ ] Tests and documentation
